Package fr.emn.easymol.gui

Interface Summary
GUIConstants The interface to store all the constants used in EasyMol.

It holds screen settings, dimensions of windows, paths and name of icons files, title of windows and menu labels, tooltips for the buttons, name of the actions, error messages and the the GPL disclaimer.
 

Class Summary
ActionAddOrRemoveAtom The class to register the action "Add/Remove Atom".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ActionAddOrRemoveBond The class to register the action "Add/Remove Bond".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ActionCloseAll The class to register the action "Close All".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ActionCopy The class to register the action "Copy".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ActionCut The class to register the action "Cut".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ActionLoad The class to register the action "Load".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ActionNew The class to register the action "New".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ActionPaste The class to register the action "Paste".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ActionQuit The class to register the action "Quit".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ActionRenderOrRearrange The class to register the action "Render/Rearrange".
It uses the methods of Atom2D and LewisViewWindowto perform its operations.
ActionSave The class to register the action "Save".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ActionSaveAll The class to register the action "Save All".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ActionSaveAs The class to register the action "Save As".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.
ConsoleWindow The class to implement the console of EasyMol.

A reference to the ToolBarWindow is kept.
The messages are held in a JList.
LewisViewWindow The Lewis View of a Molecule.

This component is a JPanel containing Atom2D components (the atoms of the molecule) and a list of all the links of the molecule.
LibGUI The class to store all the methods used by the GUI to perform file operations.

It is used as a library.
NavigationWindow The class to display the 3D view for a molecule and navigate into this 3D view.

As it uses Molecule3D to render the molecule, the root atom passed to this class must * NEVER be an hydrogen (see Molecule3D for more details, this class is used quite the same way).
ToolBarWindow The class to build the main window of EasyMol.

It contains references to: the currently running ToolbarWindow.
VisualisationWindow The class to hold the 2D and 3D views.

It contains an instance of the edited Molecule along with its RootAtom.
XMLFileFilter The class to filter XML files in JFileChoosers.
